players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafia. I investigated her last night. Charlie’s dead; we have to vote Diana today to win."
You: "Diana, claim your role. Bob, why investigate Diana N1 over Charlie/Alice? Also, why immediately out as detective with 1 mafia left? Everyone: hold votes; we need both claims before deciding."

Diana: "Bob is lying. I’m a Villager. Why would a real Detective out Day 1 with only one mafia left instead of waiting to confirm? Also, why pick me N1 over two quieter options? This feels like a frame."

Diana: "Dropping a counterclaim: I’m the Detective. I checked Bob N1 and he’s the mafioso. He’s panic-claiming to pre-empt me. Alice, don’t rush. Let’s hear Bob’s N1 reasoning and vote trails before deciding."

Bob: "Diana is the only one counterclaiming to save herself. My N1: I picked Diana because Charlie was talkative pregame and Alice is solving-oriented; Diana felt most likely to be scum. Results: Diana = Mafia. Simple vote Diana."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.

Alice: "Diana, claim your role. Bob, why investigate Diana N1 over Charlie/Alice? Also, why immediately out as detective with 1 mafia left? Everyone: hold votes; we need both claims before deciding."

Diana: "Bob is lying. I’m a Villager. Why would a real Detective out Day 1 with only one mafia left instead of waiting to confirm? Also, why pick me N1 over two quieter options? This feels like a frame."

Diana: "Dropping a counterclaim: I’m the Detective. I checked Bob N1 and he’s the mafioso. He’s panic-claiming to pre-empt me. Alice, don’t rush. Let’s hear Bob’s N1 reasoning and vote trails before deciding."

You: "Diana is the only one counterclaiming to save herself. My N1: I picked Diana because Charlie was talkative pregame and Alice is solving-oriented; Diana felt most likely to be scum. Results: Diana = Mafia. Simple vote Diana."
Alice: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
